name: Young People's Teen Musical Theatre Company Theatre
description: Young People's Teen Musical Theatre Company (YPTMTC) is a free musical theatre program for teens in the Bay Area. Now in its 40th year, YPTMTC offers training and performance opportunities in dance, theatre, voice, and stage craft. Previous experience is not required.
fullDescription: Young People's Teen Musical Theatre Company (YPTMTC) is a free musical theatre program for teens in the Bay Area. Now in its 40th year, YPTMTC offers training and performance opportunities in dance, theatre, voice, and stage craft. Previous experience is not required.
whatTheyOffer: Young People's Teen Musical Theatre Company (YPTMTC) is a free musical theatre program for teens in the Bay Area. Now in its 40th year, YPTMTC offers training and performance opportunities in dance, theatre, voice, and stage craft. Previous experience is not required.
howToGetIt: Register online at sfrecpark.org/register or call the registration hotline at (628) 652-2900 For show title and audition information visit yptmtc.org. Questions? Email director@yptmtc.org
agency: Harvey Milk Center for the Arts
